about_the_game:
🔥 WELCOME TO WAR 🔥

Angry Tusslin' Awesome Knights is not just an Action-Strategy. This is a campaign of conquest, a battlefield of destruction, and a test of your willpower. You will fight. You will suffer. You will have to adapt. And when victory is finally in your grasp? You will know the feeling of true domination.

Are you ready for the challenge?

⚔️ THE CAMPAIGN: SIX REGIONS. SIX WARLORDS. ONE IMPOSSIBLE MISSION. ⚔️

The world is torn apart by war. Six powerful regions stand against you, each ruled by a merciless warlord who will do anything to see you fall.

Every battle will push you to the limit. Every warlord is a wall standing between you and ultimate victory. They learn, they counter, they do not forgive mistakes.

To conquer this world, you must outthink, outmaneuver, and outlast. Do you have what it takes to bring them all to their knees?

🔥 BATTLE IS WAR. YOU'RE NOT JUST PLAYING. YOU'RE SURVIVING! 🔥

Every encounter is a brutal warzone. There is no scripted path, no safe strategy, no mercy. You must command and control your army in real-time, while adapting to an enemy that will crush you the moment you hesitate.

Every unit matters. Every move counts. You are not playing an Action-Strategy. You are leading an army to survival.

Victory is not given. It is earned through fire, steel, and blood.

🛡️ LOCAL MULTIPLAYER: CHOOSE YOUR ARMY. CHOOSE YOUR COLORS. CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY. 🛡️

War is not meant to be fought alone. Challenge your friends in intense local PvP battles. Pick your race, customize your army’s colors, and wage war across battlefields built for pure destruction.

One will rise. One will fall. Friendships could possibly end here. Gamepads will be BROKEN!

Every match is a fight for supremacy—a test of strategy, skill, and the will to dominate.

Who will emerge victorious?

🎯 MINI-GAMES & BOSS RUSH: CAN YOU SURVIVE? 🎯

Think the campaign was brutal? Think you’ve mastered the battlefield? You haven’t even seen the worst of it.

⚔️ Boss Rush – Face the warlords back-to-back with no rest. Can you survive their wrath without breaking?

⚔️ Mini-Games – Tests of skill, strategy, and absolute precision. Only the best will conquer them all.

Angry Tusslin' Awesome Knights is more than a game. It is a challenge. It is a war. A medieval battlefield set in your room. It is your proving ground.

🩸 DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES? 🩸

Get ready to emerge in a magical fantasy world that will treat you ruthlessly. Most will quit. Some will rage uninstall. A few, the strongest, the most relentless, will rise. 

Will you be one of them?

Or will the ATAK of your opponents break you?

name: ATAK - Angry Tusslin' Awesome Knights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: ATAK is a real time strategy action game with fast paced battles and chaotic outcomes. Fight your way through the singleplayer campaign, challenge a friend in a custom battle or explore a multitude of minigames.
